meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Thomas L. Friedman Kelly O'Donnell Anderson Cooper Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6380.

div.div:
2012 Power Players Week game 5.
From DAR Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C.

td.p: Thomas L. Friedman, an author and foreign affairs columnist from The New York Times
Kelly O'Donnell, a political reporter from NBC News
Anderson Cooper, a news anchor and correspondent from CNN

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Central Alabama\'s Black Belt is famous for growing this fiber that was once "king"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Central Alabama's Black Belt is famous for growing this fiber that was once "king"

white

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 12):
Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: (Alex: [*] in quotation marks--two words in each correct response, the first word beginning with an "A", the second word beginning with the letter "C".)
(Alex: Tom, you're gonna love this. Not HOT, FLAT, & CROWDED but...)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: What was king in the South? That\'s what you had to figure out.)
...
(Anderson: I was more writing, "Who invented the cotton gin?" But I--)
Kelly OWho is Carver
$500
TomWho
$7,400
AndersonWho invented cot
$1,201
Eli Whitney')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The National Inventors Hall of Fame said his work "brought the South prosperity", but he was out of business within 5 years')

tr.td: The National Inventors Hall of Fame said his work "brought the South prosperity", but he was out of business within 5 years
2nd place: $10,000 to the Lost Dog & Cat Rescue Foundation

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
